xxl.applications.relational
Class TestRelational

java.lang.Object
  xxl.applications.relational.TestRelational

public class TestRelational
extends Object

Class used for testing and demonstrating the functionality of XXL's package xxl.core.relational.
For these use cases an installation of the DBMS Cloudscape is necessary and the attribute databaseLocation has to be set to the directory Cloudscape provides its demo database (toursDB). So the programm has to be called as follows: 

        java TestRelational %CLOUDSCAPE_INSTALL%\\demo\\databases\\

Parameters:
dataBaseLocation - the database location
dataBaseName - the database name

autoCommit - if true then the autocommit will be activated.

the connection.

XXL - eXtensible and fleXible Library

Note: XXL is GNU (LGPL: Lesser Gnu Public License, i.e., XXL can be used in commercial projects. Projects that make use of XXL do not have to be GNU!)

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
Send an email to xxl-request@lists.uni-marburg.de without subject and the word \"subscribe\" in the message body.

Questions or Bugs? Send us an Email: request@xxl-library.de
